Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests
import os
import re
import time

celebrities = {
    ''shahzoda'': ''Shahzoda singer Uzbekistan face'',
    ''sevara_nazarxon'': ''Sevara Nazarkhan singer face'',
    ''ulugbek_rahmatullayev'': ''Ulugbek Rahmatullayev singer face'',
    ''sherali_jorayev'': ''Sherali Jorayev singer face'',
    ''ozoda_nursaidova'': ''Ozoda Nursaidova singer face''
}

headers = {''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}
base_dir = ''data/celebrities''

for celeb_id, query in celebrities.items():
    celeb_dir = os.path.join(base_dir, celeb_id)
    os.makedirs(celeb_dir, exist_ok=True)
    
    existing = [f for f in os.listdir(celeb_dir) if f.endswith(''.jpg'')]
    if len(existing) >= 3:
        print(f''{celeb_id}: already has {len(existing)} photos'')
        continue
    
    print(f''Downloading for {celeb_id}...'')
    try:
        url = f''https://www.bing.com/images/search?q={query.replace("" "", ""+"")}&qft=+filterui:face-face''
        resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10)
        urls = re.findall(r''murl"":""(https?://[^""]+)""'', resp.text)[:5]
        
        count = 0
        for i, img_url in enumerate(urls):
            try:
                img_resp = requests.get(img_url, headers=headers, timeout=10)
                if img_resp.status_code == 200 and ''image'' in img_resp.headers.get(''content-type'', ''''):
                    filepath = os.path.join(celeb_dir, f''{celeb_id}_{i}.jpg'')
                    with open(filepath, ''wb'') as f:
                        f.write(img_resp.content)
                    count += 1
                    print(f''  + {celeb_id}_{i}.jpg'')
            except:
                pass
        print(f''  Downloaded: {count}'')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''Error: {e}'')
    time.sleep(1)
")
